file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-47-02-04 - STROBE LIGHT POWER SUPPLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL STROBE LIGHT POWER SUPPLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Strobe Light Power Supplies. B. There are three strobe-light power supplies. One installed in each wing and other on the vertical/ horizontal empennage fairing (tail boom). C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY STROBE LIGHT POWER SUPPLIES - RE- ALL 33-47-02-000-801-A MOVAL STROBE-LIGHT POWER SUPPLIES - IN- ALL 33-47-02-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-47-02 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-47-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. STROBE LIGHT POWER SUPPLIES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Strobe Light Power Supplies. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-44-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 55-36-00-000-801-A/400 TAIL BOOM - REMOVAL S.B.145-33-0008 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 561 551EB LH Wing 661 651EB RH Wing 321 Tail boom D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the left and right wing and the tail boom I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure the STROBE switch, on the overhead panel, is in the OFF position. (2) Remove access panel 551EB or 651EB ( AMM MPP 06-44-00/100). (3) Remove the access panel from the tail boom ( AMM TASK 55-36-00-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-47-02 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the wing strobe-light power supply as follows (Figure 401): (a) Remove the four screws (3) and four washers (2). (b) Disconnect the two electrical connectors (4). (c) Remove the Strobe-Light Power Supply (1). (2) (PRE-MOD. S.B.145-33-0008) Remove the stabilizer-fairing strobe-light power supply as follows (Figure 402): (a) Remove the four screws (3) and four washers (4). (b) Disconnect the two electrical connectors (1). (c) Remove the Strobe-Light Power Supply (2). (3) (POST-MOD. S.B.145-33-0008) Remove the stabilizer-fairing strobe-light power supply as follows (Figure 402): (a) Remove the four screws (7) and four washers (8). (b) Disconnect the two electrical connectors (5). (c) Remove the Strobe-Light Power Supply (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-47-02 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Stabilizer-Fairing Strobe-Light Power Supply - Removal/Installation Figure 402 ZONE 321 A B DET A 2. STROBE LIGHT POWER SUPPLY 3. SCREW(4) 4. WASHER(4) 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR(2) 6. STROBE LIGHT POWER SUPPLY 5. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR(2) 1 DET B 7. SCREW(4) 8. WASHER(4) 2 DET B 1 PRE-MOD 145-33-0008. 2 POST-MOD 145-33-0008. 145AMM330197.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-47-02 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-47-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. STROBE-LIGHT POWER SUPPLIES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Strobe-Light Power Supplies. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-44-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 33-47-00-700-801-A/500 ANTICOLLISION LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST AMM TASK 55-36-00-400-801-A/400 TAIL BOOM - INSTALLATION S.B.145-33-0008 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 561 551EB LH Wing 661 651EB RH Wing 321 Tail boom D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE At the left and right wings and at the tail 1 Does the task boom I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the wing strobe-light power supply as follows (Figure 401): (a) Put the strobe-light power supply (1) in its installation position. (b) Tighten the four screws (3) and four washers (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-47-02 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (c) Connect the two electrical connectors (4). (2) (PRE-MOD. S.B.145-33-0008) Install the stabilizer-fairing strobe-light power supply as follows (Figure 402): (a) Put the strobe-light power supply (2) in its installation position. (b) Tighten the four screws (3) and four washers (4). (c) Connect the two electrical connectors (1). (3) (POST-MOD. S.B.145-33-0008) Install the stabilizer-fairing strobe-light power supply as follows (Figure 402): (a) Put the strobe-light power supply (6) in its installation position. (b) Tighten the four screws (7) and four washers (8). (c) Connect the two electrical connectors (5). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do the operational test of the strobe lights ( AMM TASK 33-47-00-700-801-A/500). (2) Install access panel 551EB or 651EB ( AMM MPP 06-44-00/100). (3) Install the access panel on the tail boom ( AMM TASK 55-36-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-47-02 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
